summary: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.
cast: David Niven|Kim Hunter|Robert Coote|Kathleen Byron|Richard Attenborough|Bonar Colleano|Joan Maude|Marius Goring|Roger Livesey|Robert Atkins|Bob Roberts|Edwin Max|Betty Potter|Abraham Sofaer|Raymond Massey|Robert Arden|Robert Beatty|Eric Cawthorne|Tommy Duggan|Leslie Dwyer|Erik|John Huntley|Charles Lattimer|John Longden|Howard Marshall|Lois Maxwell|Richard Neilson|Wally Patch|Laurence Payne|Robert Rietty|Frank Schock|Roger Snowdon|Spangle|Wendy Thompson|Frederick Valk|Geoff van Rijssel|Joan Verney
title: A vida o muerte
